MorphAnalyser - Class in shef.mt.tools
MorphAnalyser encapsulates the MADA mophological analyser for Arabic It requires the MADA install path and the name of the cript to be run and launches the perl script on the input file specified MADA produces its output in the same folder as the input file, therefore care has to be taken that the required writing rights are available in that folder
MorphAnalyser(String, String, String, String, String, String, boolean) - Constructor for class shef.mt.tools.MorphAnalyser
 
MorphAnalysisProcessor - Class in shef.mt.tools
This is a processor for the output of the MADA morphological analyser for Arabic
MorphAnalysisProcessor(String) - Constructor for class shef.mt.tools.MorphAnalysisProcessor
 
MOSES_XMLWrapper - Class in shef.mt.xmlwrap
This class produces an XML file from the output of the MOSES machine translation system It also produces a series of text files from the nbest list (one file per sentence), which will be used in computing the glass box features that rely on ngrams computed on the nbest list
MOSES_XMLWrapper(String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class shef.mt.xmlwrap.MOSES_XMLWrapper
 
MQMManager - Class in shef.mt.tools.mqm

MTOutputProcessor - Class in shef.mt.tools
This class receives as input an XML file containing sentences and lists of translation with various attributes and reads it into Sentence objects
MTOutputProcessor(String, String, String, int) - Constructor for class shef.mt.tools.MTOutputProcessor
